item.title: How to make commands?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Here Is My Tut on Commands …

Purpose: To make A command which will add items to ur inventory and a teleport command …

Difficulty: 0.1/10

Assumed Knowledge: C&P

Server Base: All !

Classes Modified: Client.Java

Procedure:

Step 1 = Making A Add Item Command

First Open Up Client. Java

Search For

if (command.

And You Should See Either

if (Command.StartsWith Or if (Command.equalsIgnoreCase

Note: This Is How U Start A Command No Matter What Type Of Command Your Writing …

Now Above The First Command Wich Will Look Something Like This Hit Enter

if (Command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme"))

or

if (Command.StartsWith("saveme"))

Note: Your Command May not Be (“saveme”) But just hit enter Above The first Command You See.

Now, To Add The Command …

We Will Make A Command That Adds An Abby Whip And A White PartyHat

So The Command Would Look Liek This

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pro")) 
{ 
        sendMessage("U Have Learned How To Make An Item Command");
	addItem(4151, 1); 
        addItem(1048, 1);
}

Note :The sendMessage("..") Bit Is What The Player Will See When They Use This Code And The addItem(4151, 1); is The Id Of The Item Wich is the 4151 And How Many Are Going To be Added Which is 1 …

Change Them To Whateva U want … To Add more items just make another addItem line And To Change What U Type To Activate This Command Change the bit between The if code[/code]

Save, Compile , Run …

There We Go Now U Know How To Make A Item Command!

Step 2 - Now To Add A Teleport Command!

Pretty Much The Same Deal But instead Of Item Ids Were Adding Co Ordinates …

So You Can Add This Command Above The One You Just Added

Ok So First We Will Make A Saveme Command …

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("saveme")) 
{ 
	sendMessage("U Have Learned How To Add A TelePort Command"); 
	teleportToX = 3239; 
	teleportToY = 3430; 
}

Note : Just Like The Item Command The Command Starts With if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("..")
And sendMessage Bit But This Time U Will Se We have Added Co ords

teleportToX = 3239; 
teleportToY = 3430;

Which will Put U Near The Small Fountain Near Varrock Dummys…

Change The Co Ords And The Name To Wateva U Like …

There We Go U Now Know How 2 Make Those 2 Commands…

Creds - 100% Me

Any Errors Post Here!

Read full topic
